signals.problem_statement: The customer struggles with managing a high volume of emails and ensuring that no emails are missed, especially when team members are absent.
signals.context: Shared inbox for sales, 4 users, handling 40-50 emails daily.

signals.problem_statement: The customer spends excessive time sorting through emails manually, which is inefficient for their small team.
signals.context: 4 people using email daily, looking for a more efficient solution than Salesforce.

signals.problem_statement: The customer has issues with team members deleting important emails instead of responding, leading to missed communications.
signals.context: Past experience of missing emails due to staff actions.

signals.problem_statement: The customer relies heavily on Google Sheets for tracking stock and damaged goods, indicating a need for better integration and automation.
signals.context: Using a massive Google spreadsheet for tracking, looking for a more efficient system.

signals.problem_statement: The customer needs a simple-to-use solution that non-technical staff can operate without extensive training.
signals.context: Team members are technophobes and struggle with new software.

signals.problem_statement: The customer requires a way to manage personal inboxes of team members while maintaining privacy for sensitive communications.
signals.context: Need to manage staff emails without exposing personal or sensitive information.

signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks reporting and analytics on email management, which hinders their ability to track performance and efficiency.
signals.context: Currently using Gmail without any reporting tools.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is looking for a live chat solution that is not a chatbot, indicating a need for real-time human interaction.
signals.context: Currently using Zendesk live chat but seeking alternatives.

signals.problem_statement: The customer wants to integrate social media messaging (Instagram and Facebook) into their communication workflow, which is currently unsupported.
